INPUT.SEARCH_TERMS_INFO: Include results containing all of these terms
INPUT.EXCLUDED_TERMS_INFO: Exclude results containing one of these terms
INPUT.OPTIONAL_TERMS_INFO: Include results containing one or more of these terms
INPUT.SEARCH_SCOPE_INFO: Search scope: 'Paragraph' will consider your search criteria within the entire paragraph, while 'Sentence' will narrow the criteria to individual sentences.
INPUT.BUTTON_TOOLTIP: You must enter at least one search term and select at least one work

RESULTS.GO_TO_TEXT_TOOLTIP: Jump to the paragraph in the full text

UPLOAD.TITLE: Title
UPLOAD.TOOLTIP: Fill out all fields to upload the text
